TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to John Cummings, 10-05-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with John Cummins, October 5,1827. Price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1684-1685

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with John Cummins, October 5,1827. Price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Col. Stephen F. Austin in a/c with John Cumings Dr.*/p* *p*1827*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-13-1827">Jany 13th*/date_mentioned* To 7 1/2 bushels corn at 8/ pr Bushel__________________$ 7. 50*/p*
*p*280 feet plank delivered unto *person_mentioned*Westall */person_mentioned*at 5C pr Hhd------------14.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-15-1827">Feby 15 */date_mentioned* Cash $5.00 ditto pr order *person_mentioned*Richd */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Dan */person_mentioned*$9______14.00*/p* *p*2 lb Tobacco a 50c______________________________1*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="07-05-1827">July 5 */date_mentioned* 1 Bushel Meal delivered to *person_mentioned*Brown Austin*/person_mentioned* _______1.25*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1827">1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-25-1827">Augt. 25*/date_mentioned* 2 Bushels Meal delid to *person_mentioned*Mrs. Pickett*/person_mentioned* a 1.25_________ 1.25*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-05-1827">Octr 5 */date_mentioned* 1 do delivered to *person_mentioned*Mrs. Picket*/person_mentioned*______________________ 1.25*/p* *p* *date_mentioned n="08-25-1827">" " */date_mentioned* 1 ditto pr Self_________________________________ 1.25*/p*
*p*1260 feet Scantling at 4 d________________________50.40*/p*
*p*$93.95*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">1826 */date_mentioned* Contra Cr Deer. 1st. By 22 1/2 Bushels of Corn borrowed*/p*
*/div1*
